content: अनुसंधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To search into or after, look after, inquire into, investigate, explore, examine, ascertain; प्रसवयोग्यं स्थानमनुसंधीयतां <ls>H. 3</ls>; <ls>Ms. 12. 106.</ls> {@--2@} To calm, compose, quiet; आत्मानमनुसंधेहि शोकचर्चां च परिहर <ls>H. 4.</ls> {@--3@} To think of, aim at, refer or allude to, consider, deliberate; यथाकर्तव्यमनुसंधयितां <ls>H. 3</ls>; नैतदनुसंधाय मयोक्तं <ls>Mv. 6</ls> after deliberation, or because I aimed at it; अलमनेनातीतोपालंभेन प्रस्तुतमनुसंधीयतां <ls>H. 3</ls> let us consider what is before us, (turn to the matter in hand); अत्र… इति पुरावृत्तकथानुऽ संधेया <ls>Malli.</ls> on <ls>Ku. 1. 21</ls> should be sought or referred to. {@--4@} To plan, arrange; prepare, set in order; सारसत्वं दुर्गमनुसंधेहि, दुर्गशोधनमनुसंधातव्यं <ls>H. 3.</ls> {@--5@} To follow, go after, attend, accompany; चरेण अनुसंधीयमानः <ls>Mu. 6</ls>; कस्ते निर्बंधः पदे पदे मामनुसंधातुं <ls>Mk. 1</ls>; एतौ तौ मामनुसंधत्तः <ls>Mk. 2</ls> are after me. {@--6@} To take up, follow, continue; तच्छेषमात्मवचसाप्यऽनुसंदधानः <ls>K. 240</ls> following, making up the unfinished portion &c.
